subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson, the defending Masters champion, joked that he was open to the idea of a plaque to mark the spot of his near-miraculous shot during last year’s playoff at Augusta.
snippet: Bubba Watson, the defending Masters champion, joked that he was open to the idea of a plaque to mark the spot of his near-miraculous shot during last year’s playoff at Augusta.
